info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 9:28PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Siskiyou County through 1000 PM PDT... At 928 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Highway 97 Grass Lake And Mount Hebron, or 22 miles northeast of Mount Shasta, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deer Mountain Snow Park, Highway 97 Grass Lake And Mount Hebron and Bray. This includes US 97 in California between mile markers 15 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
